product_name: The North Face Verto Storm Jacket - Men's
long_description: The uber-packable, stripped-down men's Verto Storm Jacket is the lightest-weight waterproof hard shell made by The North Face. This 7-oz. shell can help with a successful summit on your next climb. HyVent(R) 2.5-layer ripstop nylon is waterproof, windproof and highly compressible. Harness- and pack-friendly alpine handwarmer pockets have zippers to secure essentials. Articulated elbows provide a natural fit and movement. Elastic-bound hem, cuffs and hood makes the Verto Storm Jacket quick and easy to put on; no fiddling with cords. The North Face Verto Storm Jacket for men stuffs into its own zippered pocket for compact stowing in your ascent pack. The North Face Summit Series(TM) apparel is designed and tested for use in harsh environments.
short_description: The uber-packable, stripped-down men's Verto Storm Jacket is the lightest-weight waterproof hard shell made by The North Face. This 7-oz. shell can help with a successful summit on your next climb.
